General.Name: China Northern Rare Earth Group High-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: China Northern Rare Earth (Group) High-Tech Co.,Ltd produces and sells rare earth raw materials in China and internationally. It offers rare earth salts, oxides, and metals; rare earth functional materials, such as rare earth magnetic, polishing, hydrogen storage, and catalytic materials; and rare earth products in the areas of nickel-metal hydride power batteries, rare earth permanent magnet energy motors, etc. The company was formerly known as Inner Mongolia Baotou Steel Rare-Earth (Group) Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Northern Rare Earth (Group) High-Tech Co.,Ltd in January 2015. China Northern Rare Earth (Group) High-Tech Co.,Ltd was founded in 1961 and is based in Baotou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Zhong Ping  Hao
2.Title: Deputy GM & Head of the Preparatory Team for the Department of Permanent Magnet Motors
